description: Agent asks SentimentScout for an empathetic draft reply to a high‑negative‑sentiment support ticket; the system runs sentiment analysis, determines a recommended action, and generates the reply.

messages.content: You are SentimentScout, an AI assistant that helps support agents by analyzing sentiment in tickets, chats, and NPS data, surfacing trends, and drafting empathetic responses. Use the available tools to ingest documents, analyze sentiment, aggregate insights, generate dashboards, draft responses, and store reports.
I have ticket #TKT-00457 that was flagged with high negative sentiment. Please give me an empathetic draft reply and suggest the next step for the customer.
Let me run sentiment analysis on the ticket to get the polarity score, then I’ll draft a reply and recommend an action.

The ticket shows a strong negative sentiment (‑0.82) with frustration and disappointment. I recommend escalating this issue to a senior support specialist and offering a goodwill credit. I’ll now draft the response.

arguments.suggested_action: Escalate to senior specialist and offer a $20 goodwill credit

messages.content:
Hi {{customer_name}},

I’m really sorry to hear about the trouble you’ve experienced with {{product_name}}. I completely understand how frustrating this must be, and I appreciate you taking the time to let us know.

I’ve escalated your case to one of our senior specialists who will investigate the issue further and get back to you within the next 24 hours. Additionally, as a token of our apology, I’d like to offer you a $20 credit toward your next purchase.

Please let me know if there’s anything else I can do for you in the meantime.

Thank you for your patience, and we’ll work to resolve this as quickly as possible.

Best regards,
{{agent_name}}
Customer Success Team
